description.en:
This mildly innocent oneshot depicts the story of 2 different high-school girls, Yuzuki and Akane, as they crash into each other at the school's corridor and wake up in the infirmary with amnesia. As a result, both of their current love relationships take an unexpected turn...

*Also includes three other stories:

[*] Baribari Lovers!!! -
A bittersweet high-school story depicting the follow-up between a cute but naive girl and a bad-boy delinquent who tramples with her innocent heart. You sway along with the main female--even when her heart breaks... You may have a undying urge to punch that gangster >.<

[*] Koimitsu

[*] 2U
